tasks.title: Initialize Project and UI Component Library
tasks.description: Set up the mobile app project repository and define the UI component library as per the PRD.
tasks.details: Create a new mobile app project using a modern framework (e.g., React Native, Flutter). Define and document the UI component library including navigation (bottom/top bars), cards (vendor, category, membership, promo), buttons (primary, secondary, icon, floating action), forms (text input, OTP input, dropdown, toggle), and modals (confirmation, filter, share, payment). Created babel.config.js with the NativeWind preset, metro.config.js with NativeWind integration, and nativewind-env.d.ts for TypeScript support. Added global.css import to app/_layout.tsx to enable global Tailwind styles. The project is now set up to develop components using Tailwind utility classes via NativeWind.
